entries.m_chatter_v_2: Smuggling has been tough with the Empire's recent crackdown.  The rebels hurt them bad and now everyone's feeling the effects.
entries.m_chatter_v_1: I love my job.  The thrill of a light cruiser pushing past a blockade at full speed!  You never feel that way down here on the surface.
entries.m_chatter_v_0: Now I can finally get back to my business.
entries.prose_m_line_0: I don't see how I can help you, other than this piece of advice.  I know the smugglers in this camp fairly well.  Two of them always lie.  You can only trust the other four.
entries.prose_m_line_5: What %TO said is a lie.  I've been cheated by that that poor excuse for a smuggler enough times to know.
entries.prose_m_line_4: %TT isn't telling the truth: either %TO or %TU is lying, the other is not.
entries.prose_m_line_3: Don't trust %TT and %TO, both of them are lying.
entries.prose_m_line_2: I know for a fact that the bounty hunter is looking for %TT or %TO.  They are both considered scum, even among smugglers.  I wouldn't be surprised if one of them stooped to petty thievery.
entries.prose_m_line_1: Neither %TO nor I have anything to do with this, leave us alone.
entries.a_greatwho: You have?  Explain to me how you figured it out and if it makes sense, I'll make the arrest.
entries.r_a_ithinkso: I think I've figured it out.
entries.a_chatter_2: This job is tough.  Tracking criminals across wilderness for a meager reward.  Sometimes I wonder why I do it.
entries.a_chatter_1: I'm glad I was able to find my mark.  Now I can go get another job.
entries.a_notrust: You again?  Look, you aren't going to get another shot at this.  I'll solve the problem myself.
entries.a_thanks: Thank you for helping me find my mark.
entries.m_criminal: You turned me in!  How did you figure out I was the thief?  Did my friends rat me out?
entries.a_rightanswer: (The bounty hunter listens to your explanation.)  I see!  It makes sense!  I'm going to act on your recommendation and make the arrest.  I don't have much to reward you with, but please take this.
entries.a_wronganswer: (The bounty hunter listens to your explanation.)  No...that still doesn't make any sense to me.  I don't think your answer is correct.  I appreciate your help, but I don't think you can solve this puzzle.
entries.a_keeplooking: Go ahead, but I doubt you'll turn anything up.
entries.m_busy_2: Look, I really need to think about my next job.  Could you give me some space?
entries.m_busy_1: I wonder how long until that bounty hunter gives up or arrests us all?
entries.m_busy_0: I am quite busy, could you come back later?
entries.r_m_chatter_knowabouttheft: Do you know anything about the theft the bounty hunter is investigating?
entries.m_chatter_0: Welcome to my camp.  Unfortunately, I'd rather not take on any more assignments with a bounty hunter snooping about.  Maybe some other time.
entries.m_chatter_5: I've got a flight path to plan, but that idiot of a bounty hunter keeps interrupting me with questions.  Kinda like you.
entries.m_chatter_4: I love my job.  The thrill of a light cruiser pushing past a blockade at full speed!  You never feel that way down here on the surface.
entries.m_chatter_3: The Empire has been pretty busy with the rebellion lately.  Makes it easy to slip past with extra goods.  I would think they sent that bounty hunter to investigate, but he doesn't seem very smart.
entries.m_chatter_2: Until that bounty hunter moves on, I won't be able to inspect this new shipment.
entries.m_chatter_1: Business is good!  I just moved twice my normal load of wares this week.  Now if that bounty hunter would get lost I'd be a happy man.
entries.a_whoisit: Did you figure out who my mark is?
entries.a_goahead: You think I'm stupid don't you?  I can do this myself.  But...uhm...well...if you want to try go ahead.
entries.r_a_questioned2: Let me question the smugglers.  Maybe I can figure out who your mark is.
entries.a_questioned2: Well...I'm really confused.  I know the smuggler captain.  I trust him.  The other smugglers blame each other and I don't know what to do.
entries.a_questioned: Uhm...questioned them.  Ah.  Yeah I did that.  Yeahup.
entries.r_a_imnotdumb: Have you questioned the occupants of the camp?
entries.a_imnotdumb: Hey now, I'm not stupid!  A little while after I caught up with the signal, it went dead.  He must have found it and turned it off.
entries.r_a_clues: So arrest the smuggler with the transponder!
entries.a_clues: The guy I'm looking for stole some equipment.  Nobody knows what he looks like, but some of the equipment had a transponder signal.
entries.r_a_thatstheproblem: If you've been tracking him how can you not know which one he is?
entries.a_thatstheproblem: Arrest him.  Yeah, well...uhm...that's the problem.  I don't know which one he is.
entries.r_a_lookingformark: So why don't you arrest him?
entries.a_lookingformark: One of them is my mark.  I think.  I'm not sure.  I've been tracking him for some time and just now caught up with him in this smuggler camp.
entries.r_a_greet: No, I've never seen any of them before.
entries.a_greet: Uhm.  Hey...uh, do you know any of these guys?
